name: WarFire
description:
WarFire is our studio the first game, the game no drama, your Mission is to kill all enemies, rescue team-mate, and in the last one level driving fighter destroy boss

Available function:
Singleplayer
Multiplayer(Beta)
VR(Beta)
handle (support vibration)
Five AI difficulty

Update(May12/2017)
Fix bug of Artificial Intelligence(AI)
Improve stability

Welcome to provide some technical advice, but can not be insulted or directly with bad language comments, thank you

We will do the best, everything has just begun
